name: Bass Landing 2
overview: Bass Fishing 2 is the sequel to Bass Fishing, but this time the game wasn't released outside Japan. The game features 3 modes: - Tournament Mode: Starting with amateur and reaching pro tournaments. - Free Mode: Choose one of the lakes, lures, fishing rod, time of the day, etc and start to fish - Fishing School: A tutorial with different trials to become a fishing master. - Record Mode: Check your records.
